titleStmt.title: The honourable state of matrimony made comfortable, or An antidote against discord betwixt man and wife being special directions for the procuring and preserving of family peace.
titleStmt.author: B. D. aut
J. R. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Francis Pearse at the Blew-Anchor at the west end of St. Pauls,
